## 常用参数设置

### 包名（PACKAGE_NAME）

> 设定了日志保存的名称和gitlab 进行自动化部署(CD)打包的包名，如 > > ​ PACKAGE_NAME = “rayvision_clarisse”

### DCC软件的ID映射

```python DCC_ID_MAPPINGS = {

‘maya’: 2000, ‘3ds Max’: 2001, ‘lightwave’: 2002, ‘arnold’: 2003, ‘houdini’: 2004, ‘cinema4d’: 2005, ‘softimage’: 2006, ‘blender’: 2007, ‘vr_standalone’: 2008, ‘mr_standalone’: 2009, ‘sketchup’: 2010, ‘vue’: 2011, ‘keyshot’: 2012, ‘clarisse’: 2013, ‘octane_render’: 2014, ‘katana’: 2016,

}

```

### 请求头(HEADERS)

```python HEADERS = {

‘accessId’: ‘’, ‘channel’: ‘4’, ‘platform’: ‘’, ‘UTCTimestamp’: ‘’, ‘nonce’: ‘’, ‘signature’: ‘’, ‘version’: ‘1.0.0’, ‘Content-Type’: ‘application/json’

}

```

### task.json默认参数

```python TASK_INFO = {

‘task_info’: {

‘input_cg_file’: ‘’, ‘is_picture’: ‘0’, ‘task_id’: ‘’, ‘frames_per_task’: ‘1’, ‘pre_frames’: ‘000’, ‘job_stop_time’: ‘86400’, ‘task_stop_time’: ‘259200’, ‘time_out’: ‘43200’, ‘stop_after_test’: ‘2’, ‘project_name’: ‘’, ‘project_id’: ‘’, ‘channel’: ‘4’, ‘cg_id’: ‘’, ‘platform’: ‘’, ‘tiles_type’: ‘block’, ‘tiles’: ‘1’, ‘is_layer_rendering’: ‘1’, ‘is_distribute_render’: ‘0’, ‘distribute_render_node’: ‘3’, ‘input_project_path’: ‘’, ‘render_layer_type’: ‘0’, ‘user_id’: ‘’, ‘os_name’: ‘1’, ‘ram’: ‘64’

}, ‘software_config’: {}, ‘scene_info’: {}, ‘scene_info_render’: {}

}

```

### 任务结束状态码(TASK_END_STATUS_CODE_LIST)

`python TASK_END_STATUS_CODE_LIST = ['10', '20', '23', '25', '30', '35', '45'] `

### 任务状态码

<table border=”1” class=”docutils”> <thead> <tr> <th><strong>状态码</strong></th> <th><strong>状态码描述</strong></th> <th><strong>备注</strong></th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td>0</td> <td>等待中</td> <td>WAITING</td> </tr> <tr> <td>5</td> <td>渲染中</td> <td>RENDERING</td> </tr> <tr> <td>8</td> <td>针对预处理任务，开始的预处理，状态为预处理中</td> <td>PRE_RENDERING</td> </tr> <tr> <td>10</td> <td>停止</td> <td>STOP</td> </tr> <tr> <td>20</td> <td>停止(欠费)</td> <td>ARREARAGE_STOP</td> </tr> <tr> <td>23</td> <td>超时停止</td> <td>TIME_OUT_STOP</td> </tr> <tr> <td>25</td> <td>已完成</td> <td>FINISHED</td> </tr> <tr> <td>30</td> <td>已完成但有失败帧</td> <td>FINISHED_HAS_FAILED</td> </tr> <tr> <td>35</td> <td>放弃</td> <td>ABANDON</td> </tr> <tr> <td>40</td> <td>测试完成</td> <td>FINISHED_TEST</td> </tr> <tr> <td>45</td> <td>失败</td> <td>FAILED</td> </tr> <tr> <td>50</td> <td>分析中</td> <td>ANALYSE</td> </tr> <tr> <td>100</td> <td>状态更新中</td> <td>UPDATING</td> </tr> </tbody> </table>

### 帧状态码

<table border=”1” class=”docutils”> <thead> <tr> <th><strong>状态码</strong></th> <th><strong>状态码描述</strong></th> <th><strong>备注</strong></th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td>1</td> <td>等待执行</td> <td>WAITING</td> </tr> <tr> <td>2</td> <td>正在执行</td> <td>STARTED</td> </tr> <tr> <td>3</td> <td>停止</td> <td>ABORTED</td> </tr> <tr> <td>4</td> <td>完成</td> <td>DONE</td> </tr> <tr> <td>5</td> <td>错误(失败)</td> <td>ERROR</td> </tr> <tr> <td>6</td> <td>等待预处理完成</td> <td>PREDONEWAITING</td> </tr> <tr> <td>7</td> <td>等待光子帧渲染完成</td> <td>PHOTONDONEWAITING</td> </tr> <tr> <td>9</td> <td>等待光子作业渲染完成</td> <td>PREDONEJOBWAITING</td> </tr> <tr> <td>10</td> <td>等待结算作业渲染完成</td> <td>GOPJOBWAITING</td> </tr> <tr> <td>11</td> <td>任务超时</td> <td>TIMEOUT</td> </tr> </tbody> </table>
